title: IEEE Annual Tech Symposium 2025
description: Join us for our flagship event featuring keynote speakers from top tech companies, hands-on workshops on AI and IoT, and networking opportunities with industry leaders.

title: Web Development Bootcamp
description: A comprehensive 2-day workshop covering React, Node.js, and modern web deployment strategies. Perfect for beginners and intermediate developers.

title: Career in IEEE
description: Learn about the benefits of IEEE membership and how it can accelerate your career growth.
